entry.title: CCSCodeStandard
entry.content:
Updated to version 1.0.7 of CCSCodeStandard. Changes include:

  • Enforcing type-based variable name prefixes (e.g., str for String, int for Integer, gc for constants)
  • Automatic code fixes to rename variables to the correct prefix
  • Detection of missing 'As' clauses in variable declarations
  • Code actions to add missing type annotations automatically
  • Special handling for fields including public/private distinction and constants
  • Support for variable declarations, parameters, and ForEach loop control variables

This update improves code readability, maintainability, and consistency across your codebase.
